providers.description: The list of authentication providers to display.

signIn.description: Callback fired when a user signs in.

typeDescriptions.formData: The form data if the provider id is 'credentials'.\
typeDescriptions.callbackUrl: The URL to redirect to after signing in.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.

slotDescriptions.emailField: The custom email field component used in the credentials form.
slotDescriptions.forgotPasswordLink: The custom forgot password link component used in the credentials form.
slotDescriptions.passwordField: The custom password field component used in the credentials form.
slotDescriptions.signUpLink: The custom sign up link component used in the credentials form.
slotDescriptions.submitButton: The custom submit button component used in the credentials form.
